events.message: The customer called to report a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon involving their vehicle and another driver at a traffic intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and vehicle damage.
An claims agent was assigned to the case promptly to ensure a smooth and timely handling of the auto accident claim.
An official acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driverâ€™s license for claim verification.
All requested documents including detailed photos and the official police report were submitted by the customer successfully.
The insurance company initiated a thorough investigation into the circumstances and damages related to the accident claim.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault and damages were consistent with the reported collision.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer to cover repairs and any medical expenses related to the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim and appreciated the timely updates provided.
The insurance claim was approved based on investigation results and agreement on the settlement amount.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customer's account to cover vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after all settlements were completed and confirmation received.
